description: This file contains the implementation of the UsersRepository class, which manages CRUD operations for User entities in the database using Entity Framework Core within a .NET project.

classes.name: UsersRepository
classes.description: Implements the IUsersRepository interface providing methods to create, retrieve, update, and delete User entities in the database.

methods.name: CreateAsync
methods.description: Adds a new User to the database and saves changes asynchronously.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a User by their unique identifier, including their Notes, without tracking changes.

methods.name: GetByUsernameAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a User by username, including their Notes, without tracking changes.

methods.name: GetAllAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a list of Users with optional pagination, ordered by username.

methods.name: UpdateAsync
methods.description: Updates an existing User entity in the database.

methods.name: DeleteAsync
methods.description: Deletes a User entity identified by id from the database.
